ygData.subject: Re: Pulling Out Slowly
ygData.msgSnippet: Necromancer holds his left hand tightly over the wound in his right side stumbling as he tried to climb out of the crater where he was held up. I ll be

Necromancer holds his left hand tightly over the wound in his right side
stumbling as he tried to climb out of the crater where he was held up. "I'll
be alright" The tall bot said, trying not to show any weakness to the other
bots watching the scene. His right side was numb from the loss of mech
fluid, he fealt no pain. At the same time he had trouble fealing his feat
touch the ground giving him problems walking.

Across the battlefield Ice could sense the pain all around her, this was one
time she wished she could control her mental abilities a little more. The
mutant opened a link throughout the battlefield, "If there's anything I can
do to help, I'll be glad to. She stepped closer to Lunarpine fealing the
sensations of every cut, bruise, and dent on his body, "Here love let me
help you." she said in a low steady tone as she took an arm of the halfling
next to her.
Don't worry about me Wing, help someone who needs it." Lunarpine replied in
a gruff egotistical manner befitting his attitude.

"Don't make me make it an order" The polar bear instructed standing up to
full size.

Lunarpine glanced up, staring her in her large black eyes. "When you put it
like that how can I refuse?"  The half wolf smiled slightly, fealing a drop
of mech fluid run down his jaw as the two turned and headed back to the
Cybertronian Fire for repairs.


----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2001 5:33 PM
Subject: Re: Pulling Out Slowly


> eGroups is messing up, so if this comes in several hours late or
> something, its eGroups' fault.
>
>
> ::FZ/Perndabot/Repressor/Prowl/Kluster/Proto/Firearm/Grimmler::
>
> FZ watches without emotion as Chordate hits the ground. He powers up
> his jetpack and flies into the air.
>
> "Allright. Alliance bots, let's get out of here. Return to base for
> repairs," he says over his comm as he accelerates and heads toward
> the Iron Fist.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Perndabot powers up his jetpack and follows FZ. Behind him, Repressor
> follows in Chopper mode.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl exhales with relief as FZ flies off. They were safe, for now.
> He waits for Symphony to follow him to IR.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster watches the Alliance begin to fly off. He motions to Firearm,
> the bot walking up to Chordate and picking him up. Kluster and
> Firearm walk off toward the CF. Proto follows them.
>
> "Hysteria," Kluster says into his comm, "Redirect ALL power to the CR
> chambers. We're gonna have alot of wounded bots."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing the injured Necromancer, Grimmler makes his way toward him,
> looking at the remaining Alliance members with suspicion.
>
> "You allright?" he asks.
>
>
>
>
>

> > The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/
> > Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Minion/Chaos/
> > Scattershot/Nemesis
> Enforcer/Firestarter/Unitron/Chordate/Imprisoner/Predator/
> > Choran:
> >
> >
> >
> > Dark One saw the three Brotherhood members and the Predacon
> prisoners and
> > Alliance forces exit the Cybertronian Fire almost simultaneously.
> He didn't
> > want to do what he had to do.  He activated the eject sequence, his
> cockpit
> > shooting open and the pilot's seat following it, Chordate flying
> from his
> > seat, not being strapped in, and hit the ground several feet from
> the seat.
> >
> > The Oblitercon leader kept his weapons powered, awaiting FZ's
> orders to leave
> > the Cybertronian Fire and head back home.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Breakdown kept his weapon trained, stretching his legs, getting for
> the long
> > journey home.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Pyro transformed to his rather mutilated looking tank mode (thanks
> to
> > missiles) and powered up its engine, getting ready to go top speed
> in his
> > broken and battered condition.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Hiss climbed up on top of Pyro, opening the hatch and jumping
> inside,
> > shutting and locking the hatch after he got in.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Scavenger stayed in his HUMVEE mode, revving up the engine.
> >
> > ===
> >
> > Hot Spot ignored the Alliance members and other Maximals, focusing
> in on his
> > wounded.  He picked up Blades carefully, walking towards the
> CF.  "Get First
> > Aid, VERY carefully." he ordered.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Groove grabbed First Aid by the feet while Streetwise got his arms
> and they
> > slowly made their way towards the destroyed main entrance of the
> Cybertronian
> > Fire.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Demon Wulf transformed into his mutant wolf mode, clawing at the
> ground with
> > a snarl.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Flesh Ripper stayed in his beast mode, the hyena making a laughing
> noise at
> > Chordate being slammed to the ground.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Dark Claw remained silent in his attack vehicle mode, no noise
> coming from
> > him save his powerful engines.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Sixshot leapt into the air, hovering several feet from the ground,
> keeping
> > his blasters at the ready.  He'd rain hell down upon the Maximals
> if
> > something happened.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Ares kept his rifle at the ready, slowly walking closer to FZ.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Unitron stepped outside of the Cybertronian Fire looking around.
> An
> > important phase was complete.  He turned to Firestarter
> swiftly.  "Locate
> > Shockwave and go to him and help him with whatever is needed.  I
> will handle
> > things with the Alliance."
> >
> > "Understood." the pyromaniac said, transforming into his space
> fighter mode
> > and launching off into the air towards the general direction of the
> antarctic.
> >
> > Imprisoner looked to Predator and Choran, motioning for them to
> stay still.
> >
> > "What of us?"
> >
> > "You will serve me.  I freed you, and I can kill you just as
> easily." Unitron
> > said, walking towards FZ, the three ex-bounty hunters in tow, not
> really
> > caring.  Their ship could be signaled to come and retrieve them if
> needed.
